name: PuraHana
description:
PURA HANA - a short 3D Adventure

"that was close ... somehow i got it out ... now only to the 3 terminals ... switch things off and the way is free.  .... After you left I only have the thoughts  ... to follow you "

FIND YOUR WAY ... SWITCH OFF THE TERMINALS (RED LIGHTS) AND AVOID THE SEEKERS in this nice Lowpoly World

##################

A GAME  by Eric Pannecke 

MOVE - W A S D

LOOK - MOUSE

JUMP - SPACEBAR

RUN - SHIFT

DUCK - CTRL

INTERACT - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

EXIT - Alt + F4

--------------------------------------------------------

Note:

This is my first 3D Game ... made with Unity

it should be not stress full and I hope it is a little bit calming 

The voiceover is German but there is English translation as Text

Hope you have a great Time Playing this :-) ... and I hope to hear from you in the Comments

- Eric
